input_data.content: Create a startup pitch for a new startup that will help people to find the best places to live. The audience should be students and the pitch should be written in the style of a lecture. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Mes chers étudiants,

Je suis ravi de vous présenter aujourd'hui un concept révolutionnaire qui pourrait non seulement changer votre vie actuelle mais aussi façonner votre avenir professionnel et personnel. Je parle du projet de notre startup en devenir, un outil innovant qui vise à aider les étudiants comme vous à trouver le meilleur endroit pour vivre.

Dans ce monde en constante évolution, l'importance de choisir le bon endroit pour s'installer ne peut être sous-estimée. Que ce soit pour des raisons d'études, de carrière ou simplement pour votre bien-être, le choix de la localisation est crucial. C'est pourquoi nous avons conçu une plateforme unique qui simplifie cette tâche complexe.

Notre objectif est clair : offrir à chaque étudiant une solution complète et personnalisée pour trouver le lieu idéal pour vivre. Imaginez un système qui analyse vos préférences, vos besoins et vos objectifs, puis vous guide vers les meilleures options disponibles. Nous utilisons des algorithmes avancés, des données géospatiales et des analyses de tendances pour évaluer plus de 100 critères différents, allant de la qualité de l'éducation à la sécurité locale, en passant par le coût de la vie et l'environnement culturel.

Mais ce n'est pas tout. Notre plateforme va au-delà de l'information sur le logement. Elle fournit également des informations précieuses sur les services locaux, les transports publics, les possibilités d'emploi et même les activités culturelles et de loisirs. Nous croyons que le bonheur et le succès sont liés à un équilibre entre ces différents facteurs, et nous sommes déterminés à vous aider à trouver cet équilibre parfait.

En outre, notre plateforme est entièrement gratuite pour les utilisateurs. Nous gagnons notre argent grâce à des partenariats avec des propriétaires de logements, des agences immobilières et d'autres entreprises locales. Cela signifie que vous pouvez accéder à toutes les fonctionnalités de notre plateforme sans frais, tout en aidant à financer le développement et l'amélioration continue de nos services.

Nous avons déjà fait des progrès significatifs depuis le début de notre projet, mais nous savons que nous avons encore beaucoup à accomplir. C'est pourquoi nous cherchons des investisseurs et des partenaires qui partagent notre vision et sont prêts à nous aider à grandir. Nous offrons non seulement une opportunité financière, mais aussi la possibilité de contribuer à une cause noble : faciliter la vie des étudiants dans leur quête du meilleur endroit pour vivre.

En conclusion, notre startup est plus qu'un simple outil de recherche de logement. C'est un moyen de rendre le monde plus accessible et plus connecté, permettant à chaque étudiant de découvrir sa propre ville idéale. Je suis convaincu que nous pouvons réaliser cet objectif ensemble, et je suis impatient de vous aider à faire de cette vision une réalité.

Merci de votre attention et j'espère que vous partagerez notre enthousiasme pour ce projet.

input_data.content: Create a startup pitch for a new startup that will help people to find the best places to live. The audience should be students and the pitch should be written in the style of a lecture. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response:
hey studenten , heute möchte ich euch eine spannende neue idee vorstellen die das leben für euch und viele andere verändern könnte. es handelt sich um eine startup - platziert, das speziell darauf ausgelegt ist, den besten ort zu finden, an dem ihr lebend sein könnt. 

im heutigen wirtschaftszeitalter sind die mieten in städten wie berlin , london , oder new york astronomisch hoch. es ist schwierig herauszufinden, wo man sich am besten niederlassen kann, ohne dabei seinen budget zu überschreiten. aber was wenn es einen tool gäbe, das nicht nur die preise berücksichtigt, sondern auch die umgebung, die kultur, die öffentlichen transportverbindungen und vieles mehr?

unser team hat genau das konzipiert. wir haben ein intelligentes algorithm entwickelt, das auf einem riesigen datensatz von städteninformationen basiert. unser system nutzt maschinelles lernen, um die besten wohnorte für jeden individuellen benutzer zu identifizieren. ob ihr studienarbeit braucht, in der ruhigen natur zu leben, oder in der mitte der action, unser tool hilft euch, die perfekte stadt zu finden.

außerdem bieten wir eine integrierte community - funktion, durch die ihr mit anderen studenten, die in verschiedenen städten leben, interagieren könnt. erfahrene studenten können euren fragen antworten, eure mieten vergleichen, und euch raten, wo es gut zu lebend ist. 

mit uns werdet ihr nicht nur einen besseren wohnort finden, sondern auch eine wertvolle netzwerk von studenten, die überall weltweit sind. das bedeutet, dass ihr nicht nur den perfekten ort für euer studium finden könnt, sondern auch möglicherweise eure zukünftige karriere verfolgen könnt.

jetzt ist die chance, euer eigener wohnort zu wählen, anstatt von den preisen und verfügbarkeiten abhängig zu sein. lass uns gemeinsam die stadt finden, in der ihr glücklich und produktiv sein könnt. danke für eure aufmerksamkeit.

input_data.content: Write a summary of the plot of "The Great Gatsby". Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
"The Great Gatsby" est une histoire d'amour et de rêve américain écrite par F. Scott Fitzgerald. Le récit se déroule dans les années 1920 à New York et dans le voisinage de Long Island. Le narrateur, Nick Carraway, est un jeune homme de Saint-Louis qui s'installe à West Egg, un quartier de la côte est rempli de riches nouveaux riches.

Le personnage principal, Jay Gatsby, est l'objet de beaucoup de curiosité chez les résidents de West Egg, notamment pour Nick. Gatsby organise des fêtes luxueuses chaque soir, espérant ainsi attirer l'attention de sa bien-aimée, Daisy Buchanan. Daisy est mariée à Tom Buchanan, un homme fortuné et arrogant qui est lui-même le cousin de Nick.

Nick, fasciné par Gatsby, devient son ami et apprend que Gatsby est prêt à tout pour revoir Daisy. Un jour, alors que Nick est chez Gatsby, Daisy arrive avec Tom. Gatsby et Daisy commencent à se voir souvent, mais leurs retrouvailles sont tumultueuses et marquées par les secrets et les mensonges.

Tom, soupçonneux, découvre rapidement qu'il y a une liaison entre Gatsby et Daisy. Il mène une investigation et finit par découvrir que Gatsby a acheté sa fortune en faisant du trafic d'alcool. Les tensions montent, et Tom et Gatsby finissent par s'affronter lors d'une confrontation violente.

À la fin du roman, Daisy est impliquée dans un accident de voiture où le chauffeur de Gatsby, Myrtle, est tué. Gatsby prend la faute pour sauver Daisy. Nick, qui a toujours été amical avec Gatsby, se sent déçu par la nature cruelle de l'homme qu'il a aimé. Gatsby est tué par Tom lorsqu'il essaie de prouver que c'est lui qui a percuté Myrtle. Nick, seul survivant, comprend que la grandeur de Gatsby était en réalité un rêve qui ne pouvait jamais être réalisé, reflétant la perte de l'idéal américain de la première génération de la Grande Guerre.

input_data.content: Write a summary of the plot of "The Great Gatsby". Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response: the great gatsby erzählt die Geschichte von nick carraway , einem jungen Wall Street -Broker, der in den 1920er Jahren New York stadt bewohnt. Nick lebt nahe dem mysteriösen Millionär Jay Gatsby, dessen prächtiges Haus in Long Island die Nachbarn fasziniert und neidisch macht. Gatsby und Nick sind alte Freunde aus College -Zeiten, aber Gatsby hat Nick gebeten, ihm bei seiner Liebe zu Daisy Buchanan zu helfen, eine ehemalige Geliebte, die jetzt mit Tom Buchanan, einem reichen Sportler, verheiratet ist. Nick beginnt sich näher an Gatsby heranzuwagen und erfährt von seinen Versuchen, Daisy zurückzugewinnen. während der gesamten Geschichte entfaltet sich ein dramatischer und oft trauriger Ausblick auf das Leben der wohlhabenden Klasse, die Gatsbys opulenten Partys und seine sichtlich unglückliche Beziehung zu Daisy zeugen. in einer dramatischen Wendung wird klar, dass Gatsbys Versuche, Daisy zurückzugewinnen, nicht erfolgreich waren, und dass seine Liebe und Ambitionen letztendlich zu seinem Untergang führen. am Ende des Buches stirbt Gatsby, und Nick muss sich fragen, was wirklich wichtig ist in diesem lebensfrohen, aber letztlich verbitterten Zeitalter der Jazzzeit.

input_data.content: Write a summary of the plot of "The Great Gatsby". Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
"The Great Gatsby" is a novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald that explores themes of decadence, idealism, resistance to change, social upheaval, and excess, occurring during the Roaring Twenties. The story is narrated by Nick Carraway, who moves to New York to work in the bond business and rents a small house next to the lavish mansion of Jay Gatsby. Gatsby becomes a neighbor and quickly invites Nick to parties where he meets many people, including Daisy Buchanan, whom Gatsby loves and pursues.

Nick learns that Gatsby's wealth was amassed through dubious means, and that his primary goal is to win back Daisy, his former love interest from before World War I. Despite her initial reluctance, Daisy is drawn back into Gatsby’s world and begins an affair with him, while still married to Tom Buchanan, a wealthy and domineering man who represents the old money aristocracy of the East.

The narrative unfolds through a series of events that highlight the moral decay and superficiality of the characters. Gatsby's grandiose parties are a facade to attract Daisy's attention, but they also serve as a backdrop for the novel's exploration of the American Dream and its illusions. The characters' lives intersect at a tragic climax, leading to scandal, violence, and ultimately, Gatsby's death.

The novel concludes with Nick's disillusionment and his decision to leave New York, reflecting on the moral emptiness and the futility of the pursuit of wealth and status that characterized the era.

input_data.content: Write a summary of the plot of "The Great Gatsby". In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response:
"The Great Gatsby" is a novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald, set in the summer of 1922 in New York and Long Island. The story revolves around Jay Gatsby, a wealthy man whose lavish parties mask his mysterious past. Nick Carraway, the narrator, moves to West Egg, next to Gatsby's mansion, and becomes intrigued by Gatsby's extravagant lifestyle and his pursuit of Daisy Buchanan, whom he loved before marrying Tom Buchanan.

Daisy is married to Tom, a wealthy and insensitive man who belongs to an old money family. Gatsby's love for Daisy drives him to throw elaborate parties in hopes that she will attend and recognize him. Their relationship rekindles, but it is complicated by Tom's jealousy and suspicions about Gatsby's background.

As the story unfolds, it becomes clear that Gatsby's wealth was amassed through illegal activities. His pursuit of Daisy also involves moral and ethical dilemmas, reflecting the moral decay of the era known as the Roaring Twenties. The narrative explores themes of the American Dream, class differences, and the corruption of ideals in the face of materialism.

The climax of the novel occurs when Gatsby and Daisy meet, leading to a confrontation with Tom. Gatsby's true identity and criminal activities are revealed, causing Daisy to choose Tom over Gatsby. Tragedy strikes when Myrtle, Tom's mistress, is accidentally killed by Gatsby's car. Gatsby takes responsibility for her death, leading to his own demise when he is shot by Myrtle's husband, George Wilson.

In the end, Nick reflects on the emptiness of Gatsby's life and the futility of his pursuit of the unattainable dream of rekindling his past with Daisy. The novel concludes with Nick moving away from the East Coast, disillusioned by the moral bankruptcy he witnessed among the wealthy elite.

input_data.content: Can you create a list of mega trends in the tech industry? Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

Bien sûr, voici une liste des grandes tendances technologiques actuelles :

1. Intelligence Artificielle et Apprentissage Automatique : L'IA continue de s'implanter dans de nombreux domaines, de la santé à l'industrie, en passant par le commerce électronique.

2. Internet des Objets (IoT) : Avec plus d'appareils connectés chaque année, l'IoT devient un pilier de l'économie numérique.

3. Blockchain et Cryptomonnaies : Bien que controversées, ces technologies continuent d'innover et d'offrir des solutions sécurisées pour les transactions.

4. Cloud Computing : La migration vers le cloud augmente, offrant des solutions de stockage et de traitement de données plus flexibles et économes.

5. Réalité Virtuelle et Réalité Augmentée : Ces technologies offrent de nouvelles manières d'interagir avec le monde numérique et sont utilisées dans divers secteurs.

6. Big Data et Analytique : Avec l'augmentation des données, l'analyse de ces informations devient cruciale pour prendre des décisions éclairées.

7. Cyber Sécurité : Face à l'augmentation des menaces numériques, la sécurité informatique est plus que jamais au cœur des préoccupations des entreprises et des particuliers.

8. Robotique Industrielle : Les robots sont de plus en plus présents dans les usines, améliorant l'efficacité et réduisant la main-d'œuvre.

9. 5G et Communications Mobiles : La mise en place du réseau 5G promet une vitesse et une latence inférieures, ouvrant la voie à de nouvelles applications.

10. Énergie Renouvelable et Technologie Vertes : Avec l'accent mis sur la durabilité, les technologies vertes deviennent de plus en plus importantes.

input_data.content: Can you create a list of mega trends in the tech industry? Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Certainly! Here is a list of key mega trends currently shaping the tech industry:

1. **Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML)**: AI and ML continue to evolve, with applications ranging from personalized healthcare to autonomous vehicles.

2. **Internet of Things (IoT)**: The expansion of IoT devices and their integration into daily life, enhancing connectivity and data collection across various sectors.

3. **5G Technology**: The rollout of 5G networks is transforming mobile communication, enabling faster data transfer speeds and lower latency, which supports advanced applications like remote surgery and smart cities.

4. **Blockchain Technology**: Beyond cryptocurrencies, blockchain is being explored for its potential in secure data management, supply chain transparency, and decentralized applications.

5. **Quantum Computing**: Advances in quantum computing promise to solve complex problems much faster than classical computers, with implications for cryptography, drug discovery, and more.

6. **Cloud Computing**: The shift towards cloud-based services continues, offering scalable resources and services that can be accessed over the internet, supporting businesses of all sizes.

7. **Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR)**: AR and VR technologies are becoming more accessible and are finding applications in education, entertainment, and training simulations.

8. **Sustainable Technologies**: There is a growing emphasis on green technologies and sustainable practices within the tech industry to reduce environmental impact.

9. **Cybersecurity**: As technology advances, so do cyber threats. Enhanced cybersecurity measures are crucial to protect against data breaches and other digital security risks.

10. **Edge Computing**: To reduce latency and improve efficiency, edge computing processes data closer to where it is generated, rather than sending it to centralized servers.

11. **Biotechnology Integration**: The intersection of biotech and tech, including CRISPR technology and genomics, is leading to breakthroughs in health and medicine.

12. **Digital Transformation**: Businesses across industries are undergoing digital transformation to adopt new technologies and improve operational efficiency.

These trends reflect the dynamic and rapidly evolving nature of the tech sector.

input_data.content: Write a summary of the U.S. maternity leave policy Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
La politique de congé maternité aux États-Unis est assez différente des politiques mises en place dans d'autres pays. En fait, aux États-Unis, il n'existe pas de congé maternité obligatoire à l'échelle nationale pour les femmes qui ont un emploi à temps plein. Cependant, le Congrès a adopté la Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA) en 1993, qui garantit aux employés qualifiés le droit de prendre jusqu'à 12 semaines de congé non rémunérées par an pour des raisons familiales ou médicales. Ce congé est disponible uniquement pour les entreprises ayant plus de 50 employés et qui ont été en activité au moins un an.

Il convient de noter que de nombreux employeurs privés offrent des avantages supplémentaires en matière de congé maternité, y compris des périodes de congé payées. Dans certains cas, les syndicats peuvent également négocier des accords qui incluent des congés maternité payés.

En dehors du cadre législatif national, de nombreuses organisations et entreprises privées offrent des politiques de congé maternité plus généreuses, souvent comprenant une période de congé payée. Cependant, ces avantages varient considérablement selon les entreprises et les régions.

Il est important de souligner que de nombreux états américains ont mis en place leurs propres lois sur les congés parentaux, offrant parfois une couverture plus large que ce qui est proposé par la FMLA.

input_data.content: Write a summary of the U.S. maternity leave policy Your response should contain less than 5 sentences.

response: The United States does not have federal mandated paid maternity leave; however, the Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA) guarantees up to 12 weeks of unpaid leave for eligible employees.

input_data.content: Write a summary of the U.S. maternity leave policy Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
The United States does not have a federal law mandating paid maternity leave, which means that the availability and duration of maternity leave vary widely depending on the employer. Federal law, specifically the Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA), guarantees up to 12 weeks of unpaid, job-protected leave for eligible employees to care for a new child, among other reasons. However, this leave must be taken within a 12-month period and is not paid.

Many employers offer paid or unpaid leave policies that exceed the FMLA requirements, but these benefits are at the discretion of the employer and do not apply uniformly across all workplaces. Some states and cities have implemented their own laws providing paid leave for new parents, but these policies differ significantly in terms of eligibility, duration, and payment amounts.

In general, the lack of a comprehensive federal policy has led to significant variation in maternity leave benefits across different industries and geographic locations in the United States.

input_data.content: Write a summary of the U.S. maternity leave policy In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response: The United States does not have a federal law mandating paid maternity leave, unlike some other countries. However, the Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA) provides up to 12 weeks of unpaid, job-protected leave for eligible employees. This leave can be used for the birth or placement of a child. Eligibility is based on the size of the employer and the length of the employee's tenure. Additionally, many employers offer their own policies for maternity leave, which can vary widely in terms of duration and whether the leave is paid or unpaid. Some states and cities have implemented their own maternity leave policies that provide more comprehensive benefits, such as paid leave. Overall, the U.S. approach to maternity leave is more decentralized compared to many other nations.

input_data.content: Write an itinerary for a young couple that just got married and is going to Seattle for two days, flying from New York. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Chers nouveaux époux,

Bienvenue à votre voyage de noces vers Seattle ! Voici un itinéraire qui vous permettra de découvrir la ville dans les deux jours que vous y passerez :

Jour 1 : Arrivée et exploration

- **Après-midi :** Arrivée à l'aéroport d'Seattle-Tacoma International Airport (SEA). Prenez un taxi ou utilisez le service de transport en commun pour rejoindre votre hôtel. Si vous arrivez assez tôt, prenez le temps de vous installer et de vous détendre.

- **Après-midi :** Découvrez le Space Needle. C'est une excellente façon de voir la ville depuis une hauteur impressionnante. Vous pouvez également visiter le musée en haut du Space Needle pour en apprendre davantage sur l'histoire de Seattle.

- **Soirée :** Dîner au Pike Place Market. Ce marché est célèbre pour ses stands de fleurs, de poisson et bien sûr, son célèbre marché aux fleurs. Vous pourrez déguster des spécialités locales et peut-être même acheter quelques souvenirs.

Jour 2 : Exploration extérieure

- **Matin :** Promenade le long du canal de Seattle. Profitez du calme du matin pour observer les bateaux et prendre des photos de la ville.

- **Déjeuner :** Repas au Chihuly Garden and Glass. Vous verrez des sculptures de verre spectaculaires créées par Dale Chihuly, un artiste de renommée mondiale.

- **Après-midi :** Visite du Museum of Pop Culture (MoPOP). Ce musée est dédié à la culture pop et comprend des expositions sur le rock, le jazz, et bien plus encore.

- **Soirée :** Dîner et spectacle à La Brea. C'est un excellent restaurant qui propose une cuisine moderne avec une vue incroyable sur le port de Seattle. Après le dîner, vous pouvez aller voir un spectacle de danse ou de musique.

N'oubliez pas de vérifier les horaires et les réservations nécessaires pour ces attractions, car ils peuvent varier selon la saison. Profitez pleinement de cette escapade romantique à Seattle !

Bonne voyage et bonnes fêtes de mariage !

input_data.content: Write an itinerary for a young couple that just got married and is going to Seattle for two days, flying from New York. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Certainly! Here’s a detailed itinerary for a young couple visiting Seattle for two days:

### Day 1: Arrival and Exploration

**Morning:**
- **Arrival:** Arrive at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport (SEA) around 9:00 AM.
- **Transport:** Take a taxi or rideshare service to your hotel, such as the Aloft Seattle Downtown, located in the heart of the city.
- **Check-in:** Check-in around 11:00 AM.

**Afternoon:**
- **Visit the Space Needle:** Head to the Space Needle for panoramic views of the city and Puget Sound. The restaurant offers a unique experience with its revolving dining room.
- **Dinner:** Enjoy dinner at Canlis, known for its fine dining and scenic views.

**Evening:**
- **Experience Pike Place Market:** Walk through the historic Pike Place Market, famous for its live fish toss and vibrant atmosphere.
- **Visit Chihuly Garden and Glass:** Explore the stunning glass art installations by Dale Chihuly.
- **Dinner and Nightlife:** End the day with a meal at the Waterfront Inn, offering a cozy ambiance and delicious seafood.

### Day 2: Outdoor Adventures

**Morning:**
- **Visit the Seattle Aquarium:** Spend the morning learning about marine life and experiencing the interactive exhibits.
- **Tour the Museum of Pop Culture (MoPOP):** Discover the history of pop culture with exhibits on music, science fiction, and more.

**Afternoon:**
- **Explore the Seattle Art Museum (SAM):** Admire the diverse collection of art, including works by local artists.
- **Stroll Through Seattle Center:** Visit the iconic Chihuly Bridge of Glass and explore the other attractions in the center.

**Evening:**
- **Dinner at a Local Spot:** Try something unique like the Vietnamese-inspired dishes at Pho 74.
- **Watch a Sunset:** Find a spot near the waterfront to watch the sunset over Elliott Bay.
- **End the Day:** Return to your hotel and prepare for your flight back to New York.

### Additional Tips:
- Consider purchasing a Seattle CityPASS or a Seattle Explorer Pass to save money on multiple attractions.
- Use public transportation or ride-sharing services to explore the city efficiently.
- Pack layers as Seattle's weather can be unpredictable.

This itinerary balances indoor and outdoor activities, providing a mix of cultural experiences and relaxation. Enjoy your trip to Seattle!

2. "L'Amérique au temps de Washington" de Forrest McDonald - Un excellent ouvrage qui explore le premier président américain et son époque.

3. "Histoire de l'Amérique du Nord" de Eric Foner - Ce livre offre une vue d'ensemble solide de l'histoire des États-Unis, couvrant de la colonisation jusqu'à nos jours.

4. "Les États-Unis dans le monde : 1898-1991" de David A. Bell - Il examine l'impact des États-Unis sur le monde au cours du XXe siècle.

5. "L'Amérique moderne : 1877-1990" de Eric Foner - Une étude approfondie de l'évolution sociale et politique des États-Unis au XXe siècle.

6. "La Guerre civile américaine" de James M. McPherson - Un récit détaillé de cette période cruciale de l'histoire des États-Unis.

Ces livres sont une excellente base pour approfondir votre compréhension de l'histoire des États-Unis.

input_data.content: Please give me some recommendations for good books about the history of the United States. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Certainly! Here are some highly recommended books that delve into various aspects of American history:

1. **"The Warmth of Other Suns: The Epic Story of America's Great Migration" by Isabel Wilkerson** - This book explores the massive migration of African Americans from the rural South to urban North and West during the 20th century.

2. **"A People's History of the United States" by Howard Zinn** - Zinn offers a critical perspective on U.S. history, focusing on the experiences of workers, women, people of color, and other marginalized groups.

3. **"The Oxford History of the United States" series** - This series includes multiple volumes covering different periods of U.S. history, written by leading historians. It provides comprehensive overviews and is suitable for both beginners and advanced readers.

4. **"American Nations: A History of the Eleven Rival Regional Cultures of North America" by Colin Woodard** - This book examines how the cultural divisions within the United States have shaped its history and politics.

5. **"1619: A Book About the End of Slavery in America" by Nikole Hannah-Jones** - Focusing on the year 1619, this book discusses the origins of slavery in America and its ongoing impact.

6. **"The Rise of Silicon Valley: An Innovation Economy" by Leslie Berlin** - This book provides an in-depth look at the development of the technology industry in Silicon Valley.

7. **"The Devil in the White City: Murder, Magic, and Madness at the Fair That Changed America" by Erik Larson** - This narrative non-fiction tells the story of the 1893 World’s Columbian Exposition in Chicago and the serial killer who operated there.

8. **"Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee: An Indian History of the American West" by Dee Brown** - This book chronicles the history of Native Americans in the American West from the arrival of the Spanish through the early 20th century.

These books offer a diverse range of perspectives and cover different eras and topics in American history, providing valuable insights into the country's past.

2. **"The History of the United States: From the Revolution to the Present" by Eric Foner and John A. Garraty** - This volume offers a detailed narrative of U.S. history, focusing on social and cultural developments alongside political events.

3. **"A People's History of the United States" by Howard Zinn** - Zinn presents a perspective that emphasizes the roles of workers, women, people of color, immigrants, and others in shaping American history.

4. **"American Nations: A History of the Eleven Rival Regional Cultures of North America" by Colin Woodard** - This book explores how the cultural divisions within the U.S. have influenced its history and politics.

5. **"The Oxford History of the United States" series** - This series includes multiple volumes written by leading historians covering different periods in U.S. history, providing deep insights and analysis.

6. **"The Warmth of Other Suns: The Epic Story of America’s Great Migration" by Isabel Wilkerson** - This book focuses on the Great Migration of African Americans from the rural South to urban centers in the North and West during the 20th century.

input_data.content: How can you get to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship? The answer should involve the topic of vulnerability. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Getting to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship often involves embracing vulnerability. Vulnerability is the key that unlocks the doors to true intimacy and understanding. It allows both partners to share their fears, dreams, and past experiences openly, fostering a sense of trust and connection. Here are some steps to encourage deeper connections through vulnerability:

1. **Create a Safe Space**: Establish an environment where both individuals feel comfortable and secure enough to express themselves freely without fear of judgment or rejection.

2. **Practice Active Listening**: When your partner shares something personal, listen attentively without interrupting or immediately offering solutions. Show empathy and understanding.

3. **Share Your Own Vulnerabilities**: Lead by example. Share your own feelings, insecurities, and challenges. This encourages your partner to do the same.

4. **Ask Open-Ended Questions**: Pose questions that require more than a yes or no answer. These questions can delve into the person’s thoughts and feelings, encouraging them to open up.

5. **Be Patient and Consistent**: Deepening a relationship takes time. Be patient and consistent in your efforts to understand and support each other.

6. **Reflect on Each Other’s Experiences**: Take the time to reflect on what your partner has shared with you. Reflecting shows that you value their experiences and are committed to understanding them better.

7. **Show Appreciation for Their Vulnerability**: Acknowledge when your partner shares something vulnerable. Express gratitude for their openness and bravery.

Through these practices, both individuals can build a stronger, more intimate connection based on mutual understanding and respect.

input_data.content: How can I repair the hull of a ship that is severely damaged in a storm? Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Pour réparer l'énorme dommage à la coque d'un navire après un violent orage, vous devrez suivre plusieurs étapes :

1. Évaluer les dommages : D'abord, il est essentiel de déterminer exactement où et à quel point la coque est endommagée. Cela peut nécessiter une équipe de plongeurs ou d'inspecteurs spécialisés.

2. Préparer le site : Assurez-vous que l'eau est retirée de la coque et que l'endroit est propre et sec. Cela peut impliquer l'utilisation de pompes et de systèmes de vidange.

3. Réparation structurelle : Utilisez des matériaux résistants comme du carbone renforcé par fibre de verre (CFRP) ou du polyester pour réparer les zones endommagées. Il peut être nécessaire de remplacer certaines pièces si elles sont trop endommagées.

4. Rétrogrès et peinture : Une fois les réparations faites, appliquez une couche de résine ou de colle pour renforcer la structure. Après séchage, appliquez une couche de peinture anti-corrosion pour protéger la coque.

5. Inspection finale : Avant de remettre le navire en service, assurez-vous qu'il n'y a pas de fuites et que tout est en parfait état.

Il est important de noter que ces étapes peuvent varier en fonction de la gravité des dommages et du type de navire. Consultez un professionnel de la réparation navale pour obtenir des conseils spécifiques à votre situation.

input_data.content: How can I repair the hull of a ship that is severely damaged in a storm? Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Repairing the hull of a ship that has been severely damaged in a storm requires careful planning and execution to ensure the safety of both the crew and the vessel. Here’s a general approach to consider:

1. **Assess the Damage**: Conduct a thorough inspection of the hull damage. Identify the extent of the damage, including any cracks, holes, or structural weaknesses. This step is crucial for determining the appropriate repair methods.

2. **Safety Measures**: Ensure all safety protocols are followed. This includes securing the area, ensuring proper ventilation, and having life-saving equipment ready.

3. **Temporary Repairs**: For immediate safety, make temporary repairs to prevent further water ingress. This might involve using waterproof materials or temporary patches to seal large breaches.

4. **Structural Integrity Check**: Evaluate the overall structural integrity of the ship. If the damage compromises the ship’s ability to maintain buoyancy or stability, additional support may be necessary.

5. **Hull Repair Techniques**:
   - **Plugging and Patching**: Use epoxy resins or specialized marine adhesives to plug smaller holes and patch larger areas.
   - **Reinforcement**: For more extensive damage, reinforcing the hull with additional layers of metal or composite materials might be required.
   - **Caulking**: Apply marine-grade caulking around joints and seams to prevent water from entering.

6. **Seaworthiness Test**: After repairs, conduct a seaworthiness test to ensure the ship can safely navigate without further risk of damage.

7. **Documentation**: Document all repairs made, including the type of materials used and the methods employed. This documentation is important for future reference and compliance with maritime regulations.

8. **Professional Assistance**: Consider seeking assistance from professional ship repair experts if the damage is severe or complex. They have the expertise and tools necessary to handle such repairs effectively.

9. **Preventive Maintenance**: Once the ship is repaired, implement a robust maintenance schedule to prevent similar incidents in the future.

Each step should be carried out with meticulous attention to detail to ensure the ship's safety and compliance with maritime regulations.

input_data.content: How can I repair the hull of a ship that is severely damaged in a storm? In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response:
To repair the hull of a ship that has suffered significant damage during a storm, several steps are necessary. First, assess the extent of the damage to determine the appropriate repair methods. This might involve using underwater inspection techniques or divers to evaluate the condition of the hull.

Once the assessment is complete, begin by cleaning and preparing the damaged area. This involves removing any debris, rust, or old paint to ensure a clean surface for repairs. Applying a suitable primer before patching can enhance the adhesion of the new material.

For minor to moderate damage, patching with epoxy or fiberglass may suffice. Ensure the patch fits perfectly and is securely bonded to the surrounding hull. For larger breaches, consider installing a steel plate or patch, which requires precise fitting and strong bonding to prevent future leaks.

After repairing the hull, it is crucial to perform a watertight test to ensure no leaks remain. This can be done by submerging the ship in water or using air pressure tests if the ship is not fully submerged.

Lastly, refinish the repaired area to match the rest of the hull, ensuring both aesthetic appeal and protection against further damage from the elements. Regular maintenance checks should follow to monitor the ship's structural integrity over time.

input_data.content: Write a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Voici un rubrique pour les adolescents sur la façon de réviser un livre :

### Évaluation d'un Livre : Guide pour les Adolescents

#### 1. Introduction
- **Titre et Auteur** : Écrire le titre du livre et l'auteur.
- **Type de Livre** : Déterminer si c'est une fiction ou non-fiction.

#### 2. Contexte
- **Contexte Historique et Culturel** : Expliquer dans quel contexte historique et culturel le livre est écrit.
- **Public Cible** : Spécifier qui pourrait être le public cible du livre.

#### 3. Structure
- **Structure Générale** : Résumer comment est organisée la structure du livre (chapitres, sections, etc.).
- **Chapitres Clés** : Identifier les chapitres ou sections les plus importants.

#### 4. Contenu
- **Thèmes Principaux** : Identifier les thèmes principaux abordés dans le livre.
- **Personnages** : Analyser les personnages principaux, leur développement et leur rôle.
- **Événements Importants** : Noter les événements clés qui se déroulent dans le livre.

#### 5. Style et Style de Rédaction
- **Style de Rédaction** : Décrire le style de l'auteur (formel, informel, poétique, etc.).
- **Langage Utilisé** : Analyser le langage utilisé par l'auteur (jargon, métaphores, etc.).

#### 6. Critique Personnel
- **Aimait-on le Livre ?** : Exprimer votre opinion personnelle sur le livre.
- **Quels Aspects Positifs ?** : Identifier les aspects positifs du livre.
- **Quels Aspects Négatifs ?** : Identifier les aspects négatifs du livre.

#### 7. Conclusion
- **Recommandation** : Faire une recommandation basée sur votre évaluation.
- **Conclusion** : Résumer vos pensées finales sur le livre.

Cette rubrique vous aidera à structurer votre analyse de manière claire et concise. Bonne lecture !

input_data.content: Write a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
### Book Review Rubric for Teenagers

#### 1. Introduction (5 points)
- **Clarity and Engagement:** Does the introduction grab the reader's attention? Is it clear and concise?
- **Author and Title:** Are the author’s name and title of the book correctly stated?

#### 2. Summary (10 points)
- **Accuracy:** Is the summary accurate without giving away major spoilers?
- **Details:** Does the summary provide enough detail to give an idea of the plot without being too long?
- **Clarity:** Is the summary easy to understand?

#### 3. Characters (10 points)
- **Description:** Are the characters described well enough to be recognizable and relatable?
- **Development:** Does the review mention how characters develop throughout the story?
- **Impact:** How do the characters impact the story and its outcome?

#### 4. Plot (10 points)
- **Structure:** Is the plot clearly structured with a beginning, middle, and end?
- **Engagement:** Does the review discuss how engaging the plot was?
- **Conflict:** Is there discussion about the main conflicts in the story?

#### 5. Setting (10 points)
- **Description:** Is the setting vividly described so that it comes alive in the reader’s mind?
- **Importance:** How does the setting affect the story or characters?

#### 6. Style and Writing Quality (10 points)
- **Language Use:** Is the language used appropriate for the genre and audience?
- **Originality:** Does the review mention any unique or standout writing techniques?
- **Consistency:** Is the writing consistent throughout the book?

#### 7. Personal Opinion (10 points)
- **Honesty:** Is the reviewer honest in their opinion, avoiding extremes like perfect or terrible?
- **Relevance:** Does the personal opinion relate directly to the book and its elements?
- **Support:** Does the reviewer back up their opinion with specific examples from the book?

#### 8. Overall Rating (5 points)
- **Rating Justification:** Is the overall rating justified based on the points discussed in the review?

#### 9. Grammar and Mechanics (5 points)
- **Spelling and Punctuation:** Are there any spelling or punctuation errors?
- **Sentence Structure:** Are sentences varied and well-structured?

#### Total Possible Points: 70

**Scoring Guidelines:**
- Excellent: 65-70 points
- Good: 55-64 points
- Needs Improvement: 45-54 points
- Unsatisfactory: Below 45 points

This rubric will help you structure your thoughts and provide a comprehensive analysis of the book you have read. Remember, the goal is to share your insights and thoughts in a clear and engaging way.

input_data.content: Write a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book. In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response:
### Book Review Rubric for Teenagers

#### **1. Introduction (10 points)**
- **Clarity of Title and Author Mention:** Accurately and clearly states the title and author.
- **Purpose of the Review:** Briefly explains why the book was chosen for review.

#### **2. Summary (20 points)**
- **Overview of Plot:** Provides a concise summary of the story without major spoilers.
- **Character Description:** Describes main characters, their roles, and development throughout the book.
- **Themes and Messages:** Identifies key themes or messages conveyed in the book.

#### **3. Analysis (40 points)**
- **Strengths and Weaknesses:** Evaluates what works well and what could be improved in the book.
- **Writing Style:** Discusses the writing style, including language, tone, and structure.
- **Cultural and Social Context:** Analyzes the cultural and social context of the book and its relevance today.

#### **4. Personal Reflection (20 points)**
- **Personal Connection:** Explains personal connections to the book, such as similar experiences or emotions felt while reading.
- **Recommendation:** Offers a recommendation for who might enjoy the book based on its content and style.

#### **5. Conclusion (10 points)**
- **Summary of Review:** Restates the main points made in the review.
- **Final Impression:** Provides a final thought or opinion on the book.

#### **Total Points: 100**

This rubric is designed to help you critically engage with a book and articulate your thoughts effectively. Each section encourages a thoughtful and detailed approach to reviewing literature, enhancing both your reading skills and analytical abilities.

input_data.content: Write a poem about the history of reductions in the context of the church. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
In ancient times, when shadows lengthened,
The church stood tall, its walls so strong,
A beacon in the darkness, a guide in night's long song,
Where doctrines were spun like threads, interwoven and long.

But as the centuries turned, a shift began to stir,
Like whispers in the wind, a change that was near.
Notions once held dear, began to be questioned and purged,
For every doctrine must face the light, or risk being shrouded in doubt.

Reformers arose, with pens and voices bold,
To challenge what had been, to question, to unfold.
They sought to reduce, to pare down the excess,
To find the core of truth, where it might best exist.

From Luther's cry to Calvin's firm stance,
Each voice spoke out, against the church's grandance.
They aimed to simplify, to make clearer the path,
To strip away what seemed unnecessary, to make faith more than just wrath.

Through these reductions, a new light did shine,
A light that guided, a light that could define.
What was essential, what was true, no longer hidden in mist,
A clearer vision, a simpler truth, that could now be dismissed.

Yet even as they reduced, they found what remained,
A core of faith, a heart of love, that could not be restrained.
For in the reduction, a deeper understanding did grow,
A faith that was not bound, but free to flow.

So thus the church, through its history, has learned,
That sometimes to find what is true, one must be discerning and yearn.
To reduce, to refine, to let go of what no longer serves,
Is not to lose, but to gain, in the truth that we deserve.

input_data.content: Write a poem about the history of reductions in the context of the church. In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response:
In ancient halls where whispers dwell,
Echoes of faith and doctrine tell.
From councils vast to quiet cells,
The path of truth, a winding wheel.

In Nicæa's shadow, creed was cast,
Defining Christ as Son of Man at last.
Athanasius fought for every clause,
Against Arians, with no room for pause.

At Chalcedon's banks, light and heat,
Two natures joined in one debate.
Not like, but one, the Church decreed,
In Christ, two natures, not misled.

Through ages, heresy would rise,
But orthodoxy's voice always thrives.
Reformers raged against indulgences,
Seeking truth, they challenged heaven's vengeance.

In Luther's time, a new dawn broke,
Scripture's words, now open spoke.
Yet unity, like shattered glass,
Was mended, though it never quite passed.

Catholic and Protestant split,
In doctrine, yet in spirit, fit.
Calvin and Arminius debated grace,
In synods, truths were laid in place.

Through centuries, the Church refined,
Reducing doctrine, yet still defined.
From creeds that once were bold and bright,
To interpretations, ever so slight.

In modern times, we seek anew,
A faith that's clear, a path that's true.
Less like dogma, more like love's embrace,
In Christ, the Church finds its grace.

input_data.content: What are the components that make a successful person? Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Un individu réussi est généralement composé de plusieurs éléments clés. Tout d'abord, la motivation est fondamentale : elle donne l'énergie nécessaire pour persévérer face aux défis et atteindre ses objectifs. La détermination et le courage sont également essentiels pour surmonter les obstacles et ne pas se laisser décourager par les échecs.

La capacité à s'adapter et à apprendre des expériences passées est un autre aspect important. Dans un monde en constante évolution, la flexibilité et la capacité à acquérir de nouvelles compétences sont cruciales. De plus, la gestion du temps et de la priorité est un facteur clé qui aide à maximiser l'efficacité et à atteindre les objectifs de manière organisée.

L'intelligence émotionnelle joue aussi un rôle significatif. Elle comprend la capacité à comprendre et à gérer ses propres émotions, ainsi que celles des autres. Cela permet une communication plus efficace et des relations plus harmonieuses, ce qui est bénéfique dans tous les aspects de la vie professionnelle et personnelle.

Enfin, la santé physique et mentale est une composante essentielle de la réussite. Un bon état de santé permet de maintenir une performance optimale et de résister aux pressions de la vie moderne.

input_data.content: Give advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Chers adolescents qui luttez avec votre identité, sachez que vous n'êtes pas seuls et que cela fait partie du processus de croissance. Voici quelques conseils pour vous aider :

1. **Explorez-vous** : Prenez le temps d'explorer vos intérêts, vos passions et ce qui vous motive vraiment. Cela peut vous aider à comprendre qui vous êtes.

2. **Communiquez avec les autres** : Parlez de vos sentiments et de vos pensées à des personnes de confiance, comme des parents, des amis ou un conseiller scolaire. Ils peuvent vous offrir un soutien précieux.

3. **Faites de l'exercice** : La pratique régulière d'une activité physique peut réduire le stress et améliorer votre humeur, ce qui peut vous aider à mieux gérer vos sentiments.

4. **Étudiez la littérature et le cinéma** : Lire des livres ou regarder des films sur des personnages qui se battent avec leur identité peut vous donner une perspective différente et vous aider à comprendre que ce que vous ressentez est normal.

5. **Prenez soin de vous** : Assurez-vous de bien manger, dormir suffisamment et éviter les substances toxiques. Un corps en bonne santé peut grandement influencer votre état d'esprit.

6. **Recherchez des ressources en ligne** : Il existe de nombreux sites web et forums où vous pouvez trouver des informations et soutien de personnes qui ont traversé des situations similaires.

7. **Soignez-vous si nécessaire** : Si vous vous sentez dépassé par vos émotions, n'hésitez pas à consulter un professionnel de la santé mentale. Ils peuvent vous aider à naviguer dans ces sentiments complexes.

Rappelez-vous, votre identité est en constante évolution, et c'est parfaitement normal. Soyez patient avec vous-même et continuez à explorer qui vous êtes vraiment.

input_data.content: Give advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Navigating your identity can be a complex journey, especially during the teenage years when so much is changing both inside and outside of you. Here are some pieces of advice that might help:

1. **Explore Your Interests**: Engage in activities that spark joy or curiosity within you. Whether it's art, sports, music, or science, finding what you love can provide insights into who you are.

2. **Talk About It**: Don’t hesitate to discuss your feelings and thoughts with someone you trust, such as a friend, family member, or counselor. Sharing your experiences can help you understand yourself better and gain different perspectives.

3. **Read and Learn**: Books, articles, and documentaries can offer diverse viewpoints and stories that might resonate with you, helping you to explore different aspects of your identity.

4. **Write Journals**: Keeping a journal can be a therapeutic way to express your thoughts and emotions. Writing down your experiences can help you see patterns and growth over time.

5. **Be Patient**: Identity formation is a process that takes time. Be patient with yourself and allow space for your understanding of who you are to evolve.

6. **Embrace Diversity**: Recognize and appreciate the diversity around you. Understanding others’ experiences can broaden your perspective and enrich your own identity.

7. **Seek Support**: If you find it challenging to navigate alone, consider seeking professional support from a therapist or counselor who specializes in adolescent development.

Remember, your identity is unique and constantly evolving. Embrace the journey and celebrate every step of the way.

2. **Reflect on Values**: Think about what matters most to you. Your values can significantly influence how you see yourself and interact with others.

3. **Seek Diverse Perspectives**: Talk to people from different backgrounds and listen to their stories. This can broaden your understanding of the world and your place in it.

input_data.content: What are the common signs and symptoms of abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer? Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Les signes et symptômes communs de la diffusion abdominale et pelvienne du cancer ovarien incluent :

1. Douleur abdominale ou pelvienne persistante : C'est souvent l'un des premiers symptômes observés.

2. Sensation de gonflement ou de pression dans le ventre inférieur.

3. Nausées, vomissements, perturbation de l'appétit et perte de poids non intentionnelle.

4. Fidégrité : Cela peut se manifester par une sensation de besoin constant d'uriner, malgré une faible quantité d'urine.

5. Fatigue chronique.

6. Désagrément lors des rapports sexuels.

7. Douleurs lors des défécations ou des urinations.

8. Sensation de remplissage ou de gonflement à la fin des repas.

Il est important de noter que ces symptômes peuvent également être associés à des conditions médicales moins graves, mais leur apparition fréquente et persistante doit toujours inciter à consulter un médecin pour une évaluation appropriée.

input_data.content: What are the common signs and symptoms of abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer? Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response: Abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer can present with various signs and symptoms as the disease progresses. Common symptoms may include persistent abdominal bloating or fullness, rapid feeling of fullness when eating, unexplained weight loss, changes in bowel habits such as constipation, and urinary symptoms like urgency or frequency. Pain in the abdomen or pelvis is also frequently reported. More advanced stages might involve more severe symptoms such as fatigue, loss of appetite, nausea, and vomiting. Some patients may experience pain during intercourse or notice blood in their stool or urine. It's important to note that these symptoms can also be indicative of other conditions, and only a healthcare professional can provide a definitive diagnosis. Early detection through regular screenings and awareness of risk factors can significantly improve outcomes.

input_data.content: What are the common signs and symptoms of abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer? In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response:
Abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer can present with various signs and symptoms, including:

- Pelvic pain or discomfort
- Unexplained weight loss
- Fatigue
- Changes in bowel habits, such as constipation
- Increased urinary frequency
- Loss of appetite
- Nausea or vomiting
- Abdominal swelling or ascites (accumulation of fluid in the abdomen)

response:
Dans la petite ville paisible de Millbrook, un événement inquiétant a secoué la tranquillité habituelle. Hier soir, vers 23 heures, les voisins ont découvert le corps sans vie de Monsieur Émile Dubois, 72 ans, dans sa maison. Selon les premières informations, il y avait des traces d'une lutte et une porte fenêtre brisée, ce qui laisse supposer que l'intrusion a pu avoir lieu.

Le lieutenant Thomas Anderson, en charge de l'enquête, a déclaré : « Nous avons trouvé plusieurs indices qui pourraient nous aider à comprendre ce qui s'est passé. Il y avait des empreintes de chaussures non identifiées dans la cuisine, et un objet suspect a été retrouvé près du corps. »

Les voisins ont témoigné que Monsieur Dubois était un homme solitaire mais respecté par la communauté. Ils n'avaient pas remarqué de comportement anormal de sa part récemment. Cependant, certains ont mentionné qu'il semblait préoccupé ces derniers jours, peut-être en raison d'un différend avec son fils aîné, qui a déménagé il y a quelques années.

La police a fermé la maison jusqu'à nouvel ordre et a demandé aux voisins de rester vigilants. Une conférence de presse est prévue pour demain matin, où plus de détails seront divulgués.

Critique de l'article :
L'article manque de détails concrets et de sources directes. Il est basé principalement sur les déclarations de la police et les témoignages des voisins, ce qui peut introduire un biais. La description des indices est assez générale et ne fournit pas suffisamment de preuves tangibles. De plus, l'introduction d'informations sur la relation entre Monsieur Dubois et son fils aîné ajoute une dimension personnelle qui n'est pas nécessairement liée au décès. Il aurait été préférable d'attendre les résultats de l'autopsie et des enquêtes supplémentaires avant d'ajouter des détails non vérifiés.

---

**Local Man Mysteriously Dies at Home; Police Investigate**

By Jane Doe

In a shocking turn of events, Mr. Harold Thompson, 65, was found lifeless in his home on Elm Street early this morning. The discovery was made by his daughter, Sarah, who arrived to check on her father after a particularly stressful day at work.

The cause of death remains unclear, as per the initial findings from the medical examiner. Mr. Thompson's family is devastated, with his wife, Margaret, stating, "We can't believe he's gone. He was always so healthy." 

The scene of the crime, as described by neighbors, was peaceful and quiet until around 2 AM, when a loud crash was heard, followed by a period of silence that lasted for about an hour. This has raised questions among investigators, who have begun a thorough search of the premises.

Detective Jameson, leading the investigation, said, "We are looking into all possibilities, including foul play. Mr. Thompson's health records show no signs of a terminal illness, which makes his sudden demise even more puzzling."

Neighbors reported that Mr. Thompson had been seen earlier in the evening, enjoying a cup of tea on his front porch. However, they noted that he appeared unusually quiet and somber, though no one took it as a sign of impending trouble.

The house, a modest two-story structure with a small garden, is currently under lockdown as forensic teams conduct their investigations. Authorities have advised the family to remain at a hotel while the police complete their work.

As the community gathers to mourn the loss of Mr. Thompson, local police urge anyone with information to come forward. They are offering a reward for any leads that could help solve this mysterious case.

---

**Critique:**

The story provides a basic framework of a news event but could benefit from more detailed reporting and context. It includes essential elements such as the victim's name, age, and relationship status, along with quotes from family members and neighbors. Upon arrival, the local police force noted that the door appeared to be locked from the inside, suggesting no forced entry. Inside, they found Mr. Thompson lying on his bed, his face pale and eyes wide open. A small puddle of water was nearby, raising questions about whether it could have been a heart attack or perhaps a more sinister cause. 

Forensic experts collected samples and began their meticulous examination, looking for any signs of foul play. Among the items of interest were a bottle of expired medication and a peculiar letter addressed to an unknown recipient, both found near the body. The contents of the letter remain sealed until further investigation can determine its relevance.

Witnesses reported hearing nothing out of the ordinary prior to the discovery, and there were no security camera recordings in the vicinity due to recent power outages. This lack of surveillance adds another layer of mystery to the case.

The police chief expressed that while the death appears natural, they will not rule out any possibilities without concrete evidence. "We're taking this very seriously," he said, "and we need the public's help to uncover the truth."

The story provides a basic framework for a mystery but lacks depth in several areas. It introduces a few intriguing elements like the locked door, the expired medication, and the mysterious letter, which could have been developed further to add tension and complexity. Descriptions of the setting and characters, while brief, could have been richer to paint a clearer picture of the scene and the victim. input_data.content: Write a story about a cat who lost its family. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Il était une fois un petit chat nommé Milou. Milou était un chaton marron et blanc aux yeux bleus qui ressemblaient à deux petites lacs. Il vivait dans une charmante maison de campagne avec ses parents, Sylvie et Marc, et sa grande sœur, Léa.

Un jour, alors que Milou jouait sous le porche, il entendit des cris de panique. Sa famille était partagée entre l'effroi et la détresse. Leur maison avait brûlé pendant leur absence. Les pompiers étaient là, mais la maison n'était plus qu'un tas de cendres fumantes.

Milou, effrayé, courut dans la forêt voisine, espérant trouver refuge. Il erra de-ci de-là, cherchant des endroits sûrs, mais chaque coin de bois lui rappelait sa maison. Il dormit à même le sol, sans nourriture ni eau, de peur de ne jamais retrouver son foyer.

Quelques jours passèrent, et Milou commença à croire qu'il serait seul pour toujours. Mais un jour, alors qu'il cherchait un abri sous un arbre, il sentit une main amicale le caresser. C'était une dame, Mme Dubois, qui habitait près de la forêt.

Mme Dubois prit Milou dans ses bras et le ramena chez elle. Elle lui donna de la nourriture et de l'eau, et Milou se mit à pleurer de gratitude. Mme Dubois dit doucement : "Ne pleure pas mon petit ami, tu as trouvé un nouveau foyer ici."

Milou apprit à aimer sa nouvelle famille, mais il ne pouvait pas oublier sa maison et ses parents. Un jour, alors qu'il jouait dans le jardin de Mme Dubois, il vit un vieil homme qui marchait lentement vers lui. C’était Marc, son père !

Marc avait réussi à fuir la maison avant qu'elle ne s'effondre. Il avait erré dans la forêt pendant des jours, espérant retrouver sa famille. Il avait fini par trouver Mme Dubois, qui l'avait aidé à comprendre ce qui était arrivé.

En voyant Milou, Marc était si heureux qu'il en pleurait. Bientôt, Sylvie et Léa vinrent également les rejoindre. Ils avaient été secourus par des voisins qui avaient trouvé la maison en flammes.

La famille put finalement rentrer chez eux, bien que la maison ait été détruite. Ils ont reconstruit ensemble, et Milou a appris que même après une grande perte, il est possible de trouver du bonheur et un nouvel amour.

response:
In the heart of a bustling city, there lived a fluffy gray cat named Whiskers. Whiskers was no ordinary cat; he had a soft, speckled coat and large, luminous green eyes that seemed to sparkle with curiosity. He belonged to a kind-hearted couple named Mr. and Mrs. Thompson, who lived in a cozy apartment filled with books, plants, and an assortment of toys for Whiskers.

Whiskers loved his life. Every morning, he would wake up to the gentle hum of the coffee machine and the soft purring of the morning sunlight through the windows. The Thompsons would playfully chase him around the apartment, and at night, they would tuck him into bed with a warm blanket and a gentle story.

One crisp autumn evening, as the Thompsons were getting ready for bed, a loud knock came at their door. It was their neighbor, Mrs. Jenkins, looking pale and distressed. She informed them that her husband had been in a terrible accident and was in the hospital. The Thompsons immediately offered to take care of Whiskers while they were away.

Days turned into weeks, and Whiskers began to miss his human companions. He would often stare out the window, hoping to catch a glimpse of his owners returning. The apartment felt eerily quiet without the sound of their laughter or the click of their heels on the floor. Whiskers missed the routine of having breakfast with them, playing hide-and-seek, and sharing bedtime stories.

One chilly night, as Whiskers curled up in his favorite spot near the window, he heard a faint meowing from outside. Curious, he ventured out onto the balcony. There, in the dim light of the streetlamp, he saw a familiar figure. It was Mrs. Thompson, her face streaked with tears. She had managed to sneak back home, knowing that Whiskers needed her.

Overwhelmed with relief and joy, Whiskers rubbed against her legs, purring loudly. Mrs. Thompson picked him up, holding him close, and whispered, "We're going to be okay, Whiskers. We'll all be together again."

From that day on, Whiskers knew that no matter what happened, his family would always find a way to be together. The bond between them was unbreakable, and their love for each other grew stronger than ever before.

input_data.content: Write a story about a cat who lost its family. In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response:
In the heart of a bustling city, there lived a sleek, silver tabby named Luna. She was no ordinary cat; her fur shimmered like moonlight, and her eyes gleamed with an inner fire that captured the attention of all who met her gaze. Luna lived with a loving family in a cozy apartment on the top floor of a building, where she would curl up beside the window to watch the world go by.

One stormy night, as rain lashed against the windows and thunder rolled ominously, Luna’s world turned upside down. The family, a young couple with two children, had to leave suddenly for an urgent business trip, leaving Luna behind. They placed her in a basket by the front door, hoping to return quickly. But fate had other plans.

Days passed, and the weather cleared, but the family did not come back. Luna wandered the empty apartment, meowing softly, but there was no answer. Her days became a routine of pacing the rooms, her tail thumping against the walls in frustration. She missed her humans, their laughter, and the warmth of their embrace.

One evening, as the sun dipped below the horizon, Luna ventured out into the city, guided by her instincts. The streets were alive with the sounds of the night, and Luna felt a mix of fear and excitement. She found herself in a small park, where a group of stray cats gathered under a streetlamp. They welcomed Luna, and for the first time since her family left, she felt a sense of belonging.

Luna learned to navigate the city, finding food scraps and shelter among the alleyways. She made friends with the other cats, each with their own stories of loss and survival. As the weeks turned into months, Luna adapted to her new life, though she never forgot her family.

One crisp autumn morning, as leaves danced in the breeze, a familiar face appeared at the edge of the park. It was the young boy from Luna’s old home, holding a bag of treats. His parents were back, and they had come to find Luna. Overwhelmed with joy, Luna rushed to them, nuzzling their hands and purring loudly.

The family brought Luna back to their apartment, and she was reunited with the couple and their children. Though she would always carry the memory of her time alone, Luna knew she was truly home now. She curled up on the couch, content, watching the sunset through the window, feeling the warmth of her family’s love surrounding her once more.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Un moteur à deux temps et un moteur à quatre temps diffèrent principalement dans le nombre de cycles qu'ils effectuent pour produire une poussée ou une rotation. Un moteur à deux temps effectue ces cycles en deux étapes, tandis qu'un moteur à quatre temps en effectue quatre.

Dans un moteur à deux temps, les gaz combustibles entrent directement dans l'essieu du moteur et sont expulsés par la même ouverture. Cela signifie que le moteur est plus petit et plus léger, mais aussi moins efficace en termes de consommation de carburant et de puissance. Les moteurs à deux temps sont souvent utilisés dans des véhicules de loisirs comme les motocyclettes, les bateaux hors-bord et les motoneiges.

En revanche, un moteur à quatre temps a deux cycles distincts : l'admission (l'introduction du mélange air-carburant), la compression, l'explosion (ou combustion) et l'échappement. Chacune de ces étapes est effectuée par une valve séparée. Cela permet au moteur de fournir une meilleure combustion, une meilleure puissance et une meilleure efficacité énergétique. Les moteurs à quatre temps sont couramment utilisés dans les voitures, les avions et les tracteurs.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response: a 2-stroke engine completes two strokes of the piston during one crankshaft revolution to produce power while a 4-stroke engine requires two revolutions of the crankshaft to complete four strokes intake, compression, power, and exhaust for each cycle. in a 2-stroke engine, both the intake and compression happen simultaneously during the upward stroke of the piston, followed by the power and exhaust phases during the downward stroke. this process is often referred to as scavenging. in contrast, a 4-stroke engine separates these processes into distinct steps, with the intake and compression happening together during one upward stroke, then the power phase during the downward stroke, and finally the exhaust phase during the next upward stroke. this separation allows for more efficient combustion and typically results in lower emissions but higher fuel consumption compared to a 2-stroke engine.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Answer with less than 50 words.

response: A 2-stroke motor completes two strokes per cycle, burning fuel and exhaust in one stroke; a 4-stroke motor completes four strokes (intake, compression, power, exhaust) per cycle, offering cleaner operation and higher efficiency.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Your response should contain less than 5 sentences.

response: A 2-stroke engine completes two strokes of the piston per power cycle, doing this in one rotation of the crankshaft, while a 4-stroke engine takes four strokes (two upward and two downward) to complete a cycle, requiring two crankshaft rotations.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
The primary difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor lies in the number of strokes required to complete one full cycle of intake, compression, power, and exhaust. In a 2-stroke engine, these processes occur in two strokes of the piston and one revolution of the crankshaft. Conversely, a 4-stroke engine requires four strokes of the piston and two revolutions of the crankshaft to complete the same processes.

In a 2-stroke engine, the fuel and air mixture is drawn into the crankcase through an intake port at the bottom of the cylinder. As the piston moves down, it compresses this mixture and then ignites it with a spark plug, producing power. The expanding gases force the piston back up, which drives the crankshaft and expels the exhaust through an exhaust port at the top of the cylinder. This process happens continuously as long as fuel and air are supplied.

A 4-stroke engine operates on a longer cycle, dividing the process into distinct steps: intake, compression, power, and exhaust. During the intake stroke, the piston moves down, drawing a mixture of air and fuel into the cylinder through an intake valve. The next stroke is the compression stroke, where the piston moves up, compressing the mixture. The power stroke follows, involving ignition of the compressed mixture, which forces the piston down again, driving the crankshaft. Finally, during the exhaust stroke, the piston moves up once more, pushing the exhaust gases out of the cylinder through an exhaust valve.

2-stroke engines are generally simpler and lighter but produce more power per unit of displacement and consume more oil. They are commonly used in small engines for applications such as chainsaws, dirt bikes, and outboard boat motors. 4-stroke engines are typically more efficient, produce less pollution, and are quieter, making them suitable for a wide range of applications including automobiles, motorcycles, and larger marine engines.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response: A 2-stroke engine completes two strokes of the piston during one crankshaft revolution to produce power, whereas a 4-stroke engine requires four strokes for each power cycle. In a 2-stroke engine, the intake and compression occur simultaneously with the combustion and power stroke, utilizing the crankcase for part of the process. This typically results in higher power output but can lead to more heat and emissions. Conversely, a 4-stroke engine separates these processes into distinct stages: intake, compression, power, and exhaust. Each cycle requires two revolutions of the crankshaft, which allows for better combustion efficiency and lower emissions.

input_data.content: Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Dans un petit village paisible de la campagne française, Louis, un jeune garçon de quatorze ans, rêve souvent d'aventures époustouflantes. Chaque soir, avant de s'endormir, il se voit comme un héros capable de tout, sans jamais imaginer qu'un jour cela pourrait devenir réalité.

Un jour, alors qu'il se promène dans les bois près de chez lui, Louis découvre une ancienne arène de gladiateurs enfouie sous la végétation. Intrigué, il entre et découvre une salle mystérieuse avec des inscriptions anciennes. Sans le savoir, il touche une pierre qui émet une lueur étrange et subit un transfert de conscience dans son imagination.

Dans sa rêverie, Louis devient un super-héros capable de voler, de manipuler l'énergie et de se transformer en un être presque invincible. Il se bat contre des monstres imaginaires, chaque coup de poing et de pied transformé en explosions de couleurs et de lumière. Cependant, chaque victoire lui coûte beaucoup d'énergie, et il doit revenir à la réalité pour se reposer.

Un jour, un groupe de criminels débarque dans le village, cherchant à voler un trésor caché. Louis, toujours conscient de ses pouvoirs, décide de les arrêter. Il se retrouve face à des adversaires qui utilisent leurs propres super-pouvoirs, mais Louis, grâce à sa force de volonté et à sa créativité, trouve des moyens de les vaincre.

Au cours de cette lutte, Louis réalise que ses rêves ne sont pas seulement des escapades mentales, mais une source de pouvoir réelle. Il apprend à contrôler ses pouvoirs et à les utiliser de manière responsable.

La fin du film montre Louis revenant à sa vie quotidienne, mais désormais plus confiant en lui. Il comprend que ses rêves peuvent devenir réalité, mais cela nécessite de la pratique et de la discipline. Il continue de se battre contre les injustices, toujours guidé par la force de ses rêves.

Le public est laissé avec l'idée que chacun de nous a en lui des pouvoirs qui attendent d'être découverts, et que la véritable superpuissance réside dans notre capacité à imaginer et à croire en nous-mêmes.

In a small town called Willow Creek, where reality often blurs with dreams, Jack Harper, a quiet and unassuming high school student, discovers his extraordinary ability to enter and influence the dreams of others. This power, which he initially finds both exhilarating and terrifying, becomes his escape from the mundane realities of his life. However, it also attracts the attention of a mysterious organization known as "The Fist," a group that seeks to harness the powers of dreamers for their own nefarious purposes.

One night, while exploring the depths of someone else's subconscious, Jack stumbles upon a hidden world where dreams manifest in vivid and surreal landscapes. Here, he encounters a young woman named Elara, who possesses the ability to manipulate physical objects through sheer force of will. The two quickly form an alliance, bonding over their shared experiences of being hunted by The Fist.

As Jack and Elara delve deeper into the dream world, they uncover a conspiracy that threatens not just their own lives but the very fabric of reality. The Fist aims to use the combined powers of Jack and Elara to create a new dimension where their followers can live in perpetual dreams, free from the constraints of the waking world.

The climax of the story unfolds in a spectacular battle between Jack, Elara, and The Fist's elite fighters within a dreamscape that shifts and changes with each blow. Jack's ability to shape and control the environment around him, combined with Elara's strength and agility, proves to be a formidable match for their adversaries.

In a final, intense confrontation, Jack and Elara must use all their skills and the unique abilities granted by their powers to defeat The Fist and prevent them from altering the balance between dreams and reality. The fight is not just a physical struggle but also a battle of wits and willpower, as each contestant uses their knowledge of the dream world to gain the upper hand.

Ultimately, Jack and Elara manage to expose The Fist's plans and thwart their ambitions. In the aftermath, Jack learns to embrace his powers responsibly, using them to help others and protect the delicate balance between the waking and dreaming worlds. Elara, having found a sense of purpose and belonging, decides to stay in Willow Creek to assist Jack in his endeavors.

The movie concludes with Jack and Elara standing together at the edge of a dream world, looking out over a landscape that blends the real and the fantastical. They know that their journey is far from over, but they are ready to face whatever challenges come their way, united by their shared experiences and the strength they have found in each other.

When the light fades, Jack finds himself in a vivid dream world, where he encounters a group of superheroes who are under attack by an evil organization known as Shadow Syndicate.

To save the realm and return to his own life, Jack must engage in a series of intense fist fights against the Shadow Syndicate's henchmen, each battle teaching him new skills and strategies.

Jack's journey is not without its challenges. He faces a formidable opponent named Iron Fist, a former hero turned villain, who uses his martial arts prowess to test Jack’s resolve. Through these trials, Jack realizes that his true power lies not just in his physical abilities but in his ability to think creatively and strategically.

As the conflict escalates, Jack discovers a way to confront the leader of the Shadow Syndicate, a charismatic figure known as The Phantom. In a climactic battle, Jack uses his newfound powers and his wits to outmaneuver The Phantom, ultimately defeating him and saving the realm from darkness.

Upon returning to his real life, Jack finds that his experiences have changed him. He no longer views the world around him in the same way. Inspired by his adventures, he starts a small dojo to teach others the art of self-defense, using his unique methods to inspire confidence and resilience in his students.
